description: This Java class 'NoteRequest' serves as a Data Transfer Object (DTO) for creating or updating notes in the application. It contains fields for 'title' and 'content', with validation and schema annotations, along with constructors and getter/setter methods.

classes.name: NoteRequest
classes.description: DTO class for note creation or update, containing title and content fields, with validation and schema annotations, and corresponding accessors.

methods.name: NoteRequest(String, String)
methods.description: Parameterized constructor initializing title and content.

methods.name: getTitle()
methods.description: Returns the title of the note.

methods.name: setTitle(String)
methods.description: Sets the title of the note and returns the current instance for chaining.

methods.name: getContent()
methods.description: Returns the content of the note.

methods.name: setContent(String)
methods.description: Sets the content of the note and returns the current instance for chaining.
